name: Galloway Paul
comment: The driving experience is superb and amazing and enjoyed a lot.According to comfortable level is awesome and coming to seating matter it's comfort for single person and for dual person little much uncomfortable that's it and over all around the bike is simply superb and awesome.

name: Owens Chapman
comment: I am driving smoothness and comfort best things of bike colours and bike attractive look overall bike is good mileage and build qualitypickup is super top notchbest one thing no vibrations in this bikeyamaha is only good for service better then othersi love mt 15.

name: Farley Le
comment: I like design of mt 15.Specially i like frient look of mt 15 it looks like lions face.And i like seat.I don't need what ever specifications in mt15.I loved the design and frient look of mt15.Becouse of the design i like the mt15.

name: Oneil Buchanan
comment: It's amazing vehicle and superb bike mt 15 is very comfortable and it's very good mileage, Good experience.Visual appearance is marvelous but small seat high quality performance, Good experience, Servicing and maintenance are good awesome looks, The riding experience are good but price is high that's one problem.

name: Jayne Pittman
comment: Mt 15, Orange with black colour, Is my lover and my world is a wonderful bick and wight less with speed and design.

comment: This bike is very comfortable and i love this bike.I want to buy a second mt 15 in a few months but i reached 135 maximum speed but itâ€™s very silent i mean no more vibration.
